episodes.title: A Former CULT MEMBER Shares Her Story
episodes.description:
In this episode, host Mike Sea speaks to Isabella Young, a former messianic cult member. Isabella shares her personal story for the first time and gives a riveting account of the murder of her son, and the brainwashing she experienced under the rule of a cult. What started as a seemingly innocent relationship with a spiritual guru led to years of mental abuse and manipulation. Isabella shares her brave account of escaping this cult community and her healing journey from the trauma of the entire experience.
